mapper.select: SELECT a.studentId,studentName,examScore,examPaperName,examPaperScore FROM StudentInfo a LEFT JOIN ExamHistoryInfo b ON a.studentId=b.studentId INNER JOIN ExamPaperInfo c ON b.examPaperId=c.examPaperId WHERE a.studentId=#{studentId};

SELECT SUM(examScore) avgScore, COUNT(historyId) examSum, a.studentName FROM StudentInfo a LEFT JOIN ExamHistoryInfo b ON a.studentId=b.studentId LEFT JOIN ExamPaperInfo c ON b.examPaperId=c.examPaperId WHERE a.classId=#{classId} GROUP BY a.studentId
